title: How do you get an S?
body:
Recently I have been trying to get an S on Irelia {{champion:39}}  for m7, in order to do to I have done everything I've heard to get one, die few times as possible, get kills, get objectives, kill participation, vision, farm and turrets. In the game above i played her top lane, and did all of the above. I got an A+. 
Another thing I've heard is to play off meta roles with the champion, so I played her ADC and the second game shown happened.

Game 1 (Top Lane): https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/433351032269963265/533706759240417290/unknown.png
Game 2 (ADC): https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/433351032269963265/533699296369836073/unknown.png

I got an A in that game. 
Can someone please explain the grading system to me, I really don't understand what I have to do to get an S. This is partially a complaint to Riot for not making it clear as to what you have to do for an S and I'm also asking anyone if they actually know anything about this.
